message:
after some Google :)

var val = await System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run(() => myService.CalculateMandelbrot());

I tried using in NON async method,

It looks like an async method MUST have an async calling method.

However, this call works from NON async method...

System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run(() => myService.CalculateMandelbrot());

My question is can my NON async method get a return value?  
What would that syntax be for example above?
